About Me

I’m Brianna, an aspiring cybersecurity specialist passionate about protecting digital worlds with creativity, compassion, and determination.

My journey began with a curiosity for technology and a drive to understand how systems work — especially how they can be protected against threats.

I'm currently building expertise in incident response, Python scripting, and vulnerability assessment to help organizations identify risks and respond effectively to threats.

When I’m not diving into cybersecurity, I enjoy gardening, rock hounding, and spending time with my dogs.
